The 'nurse shark', '(Ginglymostoma cirratum)', is a shark in the nurse sharks
(Ginglymostomatidae) family, the only member of its genus 'Ginglymostoma'. Nurse
sharks can reach a length of and a weight of .<ref>[http://animals.nationalgeographic.com/animals/fish/nurse-
shark.html Nurse Shark] National Geographic</ref>
wiki.title: nurse shark
